title: HOUR 1 - Brian Flores, NFL, Harbaugh
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Brian Flores, NFL, Harbaugh
description:
Colin reacts to the stunning Brian Flores lawsuit

The NFL head coaching process needs to be tweeked.

Update on Jim Harbaugh possibly leaving for the NFL


Guest: Josh McDaniels
